about.description:
pyslim is a python module to allow reading and writing of SLiM-produced tree
sequences as a thin interface to tskit.
about.summary: Tools for dealing with tree sequences coming to and from SLiM.

name: pyslim
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyslim" %}
{% set version = "0.401" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 3557e66f83812c86204d9ce9a8df14c48a59f1471c8573bbf83978e37e3208d3

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed --no-cache-dir -vvv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - attrs
    - kastore
    - msprime >=0.7.0
    - numpy
    - tskit

test:
  imports:
    - pyslim

about:
  home: "https://github.com/tskit-dev/pyslim"
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Tools for dealing with tree sequences coming to and from SLiM. 
  description: |
    pyslim is a python module to allow reading and writing of SLiM-produced tree
    sequences as a thin interface to tskit. 
  doc_url: https://pyslim.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://pyslim.readthedocs.io/en/latest/development.html

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - winni2k
    - jeromekelleher
    - petrelharp
